summary: Highly skilled Sr. Estimator with 15+ years in civil construction. Specialized in cost estimating and project management, achieving a 30% improvement in cost accuracy and a 25% increase in project delivery efficiency.

bullets.text: Analyzed tendering documents with a comprehensive understanding of different project stages, leading to successful bidding, resulting in a 15% increase in bid success rate.
Executed first principle estimating and prepared detailed Bills of Quantities (BOQ) and tender documents, increasing bid success rate by over 20%.
Managed full-cycle cost estimation for civil projects across multiple domains, including architectural, structural, and MEP, which resulted in cost variation reduction by 15%.
Requested quotes and finalized supply pricing for MEP installations, reducing procurement duration by 25%.
Developed and presented detailed account finalizations with 100% clarity, aiding in financial closure of multiple large-scale projects.
Directed post-design assessments, which improved budget proposals' adherence rate by 25%.
Co-led architectural analysis and feasibility studies to identify savings opportunities, effectively reducing project waste by 12%.
Analyzed scope and prepared preliminary budgets, resulting in successful TOC presentations and improved funding approval rates.
Compiled comprehensive BOQs, including labor, materials, and equipment, enhancing the precision of financial forecasts by 22%.
Conducted systematic cost consulting with stakeholders and suppliers, optimizing cost savings across multiple infrastructure bids, resulting in a 10% reduction in overall project costs.
Performed detailed review and analysis of design variances, ensuring cost integrity and reducing additional unforeseen costs.
Managed documentation sets and delivery of construction tender packages, achieving a 100% on-time submission rate.
Orchestrated the quantity take-off of complex infrastructure projects, improving estimation timelines by 30%.
Led the estimation process for large-scale projects, including development of final BOQs, contributing to winning $3.5M in contracts.
Executed detailed quantity and scope analysis for various civil projects, ensuring comprehensive coverage for bidding purposes.
Developed accurate BOQs and tender documents for projects worth over $25.2M, driving project bidding success.
Led project presentations for site and management teams, facilitating seamless handoff and project initiation.
Conducted thorough cost estimations, integrating supplier consultations to refine contract prices, enhancing cost efficiency by 18%.
Assisted in dispute resolutions with clients, ensuring successful negotiations and maintaining project timelines.
Drafted construction site layouts and engineering methods, improving operational efficiency and project flow.
Spearheaded cost management strategies, reducing financial exposure by proactively identifying budget overrun risks.
Calculated feasibility studies for high-rise residential developments, including detailed project cost estimates.
Designed detailed BOQs and cost schedules for multi-million-dollar developments, assisting in securing financing.
Led cost comparisons between initial and final designs, translating data into actionable insights to optimize spend.
Conducted feasibility cost studies and prepared budgeting strategies for architectural design phases.
Supported project design follow-ups, ensuring cost adherence and compliance with architectural visions.
Managed real-time quantity take-offs on-site for over 242,190 sq ft hospital projects, ensuring diagnostic accuracy in emerging costs.
Prepared cost comparison reports, identifying discrepancies and enabling savings in excess of $4.8M during redesign phases.
Participated in strategic dispute resolutions ensuring continuity and alignment with client specifications.
